answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!If you feel there is a chance you could be pregnant, then repeat the test after your period date or go for a blood pregnancy test.Unintentional and unexplained weight loss is definitely not good. There are many causes like worms in stool, depression, anorexia nervosa, AIDS, cancers especially colon cancers, drug abuse, infections and loss of appetite. Loss of appetite can again be due to certain medications, drug abuse, depression, AIDS, acute and chronic infections, cancers and hypothyroidism. Either you do not eat well or there is increased metabolism as in hyperthyroid states, HIV, cancer etc. Poor absorption as in irritable bowel syndromes and malabsorption syndromes too is possible. Malabsorption syndromes are seen in intestinal tuberculosis, HIV, tropical sprue, parasites in stool and Whipple’s Disease. Diabetes too can be the cause.The list is awesome and I do not want to scare you. But this I cannot examine you, I have listed all the possibilities.Do discuss this with your doctor and get yourself examined. Take care!
you could still be pregnant watch it carefully and retest in a week or two.. you may be too early for results still
ok 85% of pregnanys are missed by home test i tested neg for 2.5 months before it said i was pregnant keep testing or go to the drs and have then perform a blood test and a pregnancy test

question: Whats Does It Mean When Ive Been Expieriancing Headaches , Migraines , Nauseas , Abdominal Pain , Frequent Urination , UnExplained Weight Loss , Low Back Pain , Neck Pain And Sleeping More Often , Ive Mistaked The Symptoms With Pregnancy Ones , I Did A Homemade Test It Was Negative What Might It Be
title: Sickness ?
